channel.title: Tufte on muuksis blogdown
channel.description: Recent content in Tufte on muuksis blogdown

item.title: Hello Tuftesque
item.description: This is an abridged version of the blogpost Introducing The Tuftesque Blogdown Theme on livefreeordichotomize.com. Customizing It would be pretty lame if that was it, wouldn’t it? Fear not, you can tinker with it to make it your own. Side Notes: We all know why you’re here: the sidenotes. This is rather easy. Just make sure you have the tufte package installed and then, in an inline r chunk, wherever you want to put a side note call the following.
